titleStmt.title: The Booke of bulls, baited with two centuries of bold jests, and nimble-lies, or, A Combat betweene sence and non-sence, being at strife who shall infuse most myrth into the gentle-reader a treatise in variety of pleasure second to none ever yet printed in the English-tongue : wherein is contained nothing alreadie published / collected by A.S. Gent.
titleStmt.author: Chamberlain, Robert, b. 1607.
A. S.

publicationStmt.publisher: For Daniel Frere and are to be sold at the Bull in Little-Brittaine,

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Robert Chamberlain by STC (2nd ed.).
Second part has caption title, "The last two centuries of bulls, jests and lies," and running title, "Bulls, jests and lies."
Reproduction of original in: Harvard University. Library.
